Key Match Events: South Africa posted 113 for 6 in their T20 World Cup match against Bangladesh
Spinner Keshav Maharaj took two wickets in the final over as Bangladesh could manage only 109/7 in 20 overs
Pacer Tanzim Hasan Sakib took three wickets for Bangladesh
Heinrich Klaasen scored 46 runs and David Miller scored 29 runs for South Africa
Post-Match Reflections: Aiden Markram, the captain of South Africa, expressed that everyone was going to be pretty nervous in this sort of a final over finish
Najmul Hossain Shanto, the captain of Bangladesh, felt they were nervous but they were hopeful that Jaker Ali will help win the match but this things happen in cricket
Heinrich Klaasen was named the Player of the Match for his gritty batting performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in New York
